room_title: Escape room "In Hot Water" by Escape Rehoboth in Rehoboth Beach
room_address: 20245 Bay Vista Rd. Rehoboth Beach, DE 19971
room_description:
You’ve prepared your entire life for this moment. It’s the final round of America’s greatest cooking show. You must prepare an appetizer, entrée, and dessert paired with the perfect bottle of wine. Many hours of effort have paid off. All of your dishes are finishing up nicely and your wine is perfect. With a little more than an hour left before the challenge ends, you leave to take a short break.
Upon return, something terrible has happened. Your opponents have sabotaged your kitchen! Your dishes and wine are locked and hidden away. You need to find them! Will you complete the challenge and win it all?
